content.en: Engine performance prediction: Artificial neural networks are being used to predict the performance and emissions of various types of engines, such as gasoline, dual fuel, CNG-diesel, and spark ignition engines. These algorithms, known as artificial neural network (ANN) models, are able to accurately estimate parameters like fuel consumption, power, and exhaust emissions. They are also being used to analyze the effects of different fuel blends, such as ethanol-gasoline and bioethanol-biodiesel-diesel blends, on engine performance and emissions.
content.da: Forudsigelse af motorpræstation: Kunstige neurale netværk bliver brugt til at forudsige ydeevne og emissioner af forskellige typer motorer, såsom benzin, dual fuel, CNG-diesel og tændingsmotorer. Disse algoritmer, kendt som kunstige neurale netværksmodeller (ANN), er i stand til nøjagtigt at estimere parametre som brændstofforbrug, effekt og udstødningsemissioner. De bruges også til at analysere effekten af forskellige brændstofblandinger, såsom ethanol-benzin og bioethanol-biodiesel-dieselblandinger, på motorens ydeevne og emissioner.
